titles.title: Measuring the Economic Impact of Broadband Act of 2021
A bill to require the Secretary of Commerce to conduct an assessment and analysis of the effects of broadband deployment and adoption on the economy of the United States, and for other purposes.
Measuring the Economic Impact of Broadband Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Measuring the Economic Impact of Broadband Act of 2021
This bill requires the Department of Commerce to conduct a biennial assessment and analysis regarding the contribution of the digital economy to the U.S. economy.
In conducting this assessment, Commerce must consider the impact of (1) the deployment and adoption of digital-enabling infrastructure and broadband, (2) various kinds of e-commerce, and (3) the production and consumption of digital media.
